txt.en: 'Aside from boars, I was also hunting bears in an effort to collect massive hides that could be turned into rugs, wall hangings and blankets if need be.\n\n'I will pay you handsomely for your assistance in collecting these for me.'
'These will do nicely and surely satisfy the order which I have. Thank you for all that you have done thus far, friend.'
'Bears roam all throughout these lands, and I am certain that you can find a good many hides with some effort.'
Sage Hayseed is looking for bear-hides to sell to the rug makers of Bree.
Bring the bear-hides to Sage Hayseed

Bears can be found throughout the northern Bree-fields.

Sage Hayseed has asked you to collect bear-hides from the bears in the northern Bree-fields and surrounding areas and return them to her. She has offered to pay you a fair price for this effort.

<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: Bounty quests are repeatable quests, but have a finite number of completions. This quest can be completed three times.</rgb>
